Title: Electronic and Gaming Expo
Venue: Cape Town International Convention Centre, 1 Lower Long St, Cape Town
event_text:
Cape Town’s largest electronics and gaming expo, EGE South Africa, is back for its fourth year in a row. The event offers LAN gaming, Cosplay, tabletop games, gaming competitions and a host of different stands selling popular culture merchandise and memorabilia.
2018 dates and details to be confirmed.

 
 
Tel: 021 685 0845
Email: info@egesa.co.za
Website: egesa.co.za
Facebook: EGESouthAfrica
Twitter: EGESA_Expo

Time: Time: Tue – Thu 2pm | Fri – Sun 1pm | Sat & Sun again at 10am
Title: Cartoon Network Live!
Venue: Venue: Grand Arena, GrandWest Casino and Entertainment World, 1 Jakes Gerwel Dr, Goodwood, Cape Town
event_text:
GrandWest hosts Cartoon Network Live!, an interactive stage production for children aged 5 and up, featuring Cartoon Network’s most popular heroes from Ben 10, The Amazing World of Gumball, Adventure Time and The Powerpuff Girls.
In this show, Kelvin Gizmo, scientist extraordinaire, takes audiences into the world of Cartoon Network, which is under threat of Zarr, the evil robot. They travel through the Land of Ooo, the city of Townsville and Elmore and meet their famous inhabitants. With them, and the help of the audience, Kevin Gizmo is able to stop Zarr and his evil plans.

 
 
Website: www.bigconcerts.co.za
Facebook: bigconcerts
Twitter: bigconcerts

Time: Time: 8pm | Sat again at 5pm | Sun again at 4pm
Title: Jive Cape Town Funny Festival
Venue: Baxter Theatre, Baxter Theatre Centre, Main Rd, Rondebosch, Cape Town
event_text:
The Baxter Theatre hosts the 14th annual Jive Cape Town Funny Festival for its 2018 season.
The event presents the best South African comedians and famous international variety acts on the same stage.

 
 
Tel: 021 685 7880
Website: www.baxter.co.za
Facebook: baxtertheatre
Twitter: BaxterTheatre

Title: Disney On Ice – Dream Big
Venue: Venue: Grand Arena, GrandWest Casino and Entertainment World, 1 Jakes Gerwel Dr, Goodwood, Cape Town
event_text:
Disney On Ice presents Dream Big, a new show that sees Tinker Bell take audiences on an enchanting pixie-dust filled journey of beloved Disney tales.
The show follows eight Disney Princesses – Ariel, Belle, Cinderella, Rapunzel, Tiana, Jasmine, Aurora and Snow White – who embark on incredible adventures, determined to make their dreams come true. In addition, audience members experience the sisterly love of Anna and Elsa that has captivated millions as Disney’s Frozen is brought to life on the icy stage.
“The exceptional detail and evident effort that went into creating each costume, prop and set design is staggering” Read Nwabisa Mbana’s review of Disney On Ice.

 
 
Tel: 021 505 7777
Website: www.suninternational.com
Facebook: GrandWestCasinoAndEntertainmentWorld
Twitter: GrandWestSA
